input.sentences: we washed our baby in the sink .
then we fed her some fresh milk .
next | my husband brought through some fresh beer .
we toasted some nice beer in wine glasses .
then we shared a lovely meal together .
output.sentences: Mom was bathing the baby in the sink.
Dad came in to give the baby his bottle and help dry him off.
Later, dad's friend came over and poured himself a beer.
Mom and dad sat down with their friends for dinner and toasted their wine.
All the friends ate dinner while the baby slept.
